decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2600-LBC-38 - 01/MT and 2600-LBC-38 - 02/MT as amended received on 24/06/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing house.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side or rear walls of the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the dwelling known as 57 The Vale, Hounslow, TW5 9HS.
Condition : 6 - Prior to the commencement of development on site the structure annotated on plan No. 2600-LBC-38 - 02/MT as 'Temporary Roof Canopy' shall be demolished in its entirety
description: Erection of a single storey outbuilding at the rear garden of the house
